Package com.cyberfront.crdt.sample.data

Class Factory

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cyberfront.crdt.sample.data.Factory
  • public class Factory
extends java.lang.Object
    This is a support class which is used to generate various objects related to the DataType class and its derived classes

    • Nested Class Summary

      static class  Factory.DataType
      An enumeration of the derived classes from DataTyep

      • genCRDT

        public static SimCRDTManager<? extends AbstractDataType> genCRDT​(Node ownerNode,
                                                                 Node managerNode,
                                                                 java.util.UUID id)
        Generate and return a CRDTManager for the given `node`.
        Parameters:
        ownerNode - The node for which the resulting CRDTManager is to be the approver for operations performed elsewhere
        managerNode - The node which is locally managed (i.e. the local node)
        id - The identifier for the new CRDT
        Returns:
        The CRDTManager with the managed type

      • genCRDT

        public static SimCRDTManager<? extends AbstractDataType> genCRDT​(Node ownerNode,
                                                                 Node managerNode,
                                                                 Factory.DataType type,
                                                                 java.util.UUID id)
        Generate and return a CRDTManager for the given `node` and of the given `type`
        Parameters:
        ownerNode - The node for which the resulting CRDTManager is to be the approver for operations performed elsewhere
        managerNode - The node which is locally managed (i.e. the local node)
        type - The enumeration corresponding to the concrete type of AbstractDataType to generate
        id - The identifier for the new CRDT
        Returns:
        The CRDTManager with the managed type
